Control.name: $(parent)SearchDrop
Control.OnMouseUp: if (button == MOUSE_BUTTON_INDEX_LEFT and upInside) then ZO_ComboBox_DropdownClicked(self) end

Control.name: $(parent)LevelRangeType
Control.OnMouseUp: if (button == MOUSE_BUTTON_INDEX_LEFT and upInside) then ZO_ComboBox_DropdownClicked(self) end
